ygData.subject: Re: LOC - (enchantment of light spell??)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, GZ (the Verant spell guy) has stated that it is NOT in the game yet. As are none of the temporary ITEM enchantments.  I think the guide was confused.
ygData.messageBody:
Well, GZ (the Verant spell guy) has stated that it is NOT in the game yet.
As are none of the temporary ITEM enchantments. I think the guide was
confused. Also, if it is in the game, I seriously doubt it is on one of the
vendors in a town - try out in the boonies.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Petra Fiene [mailto:pfi@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 1:33 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: LOC - (enchantment of light spell??)
>
>
> From: "Petra Fiene" <pfi@...>
>
> I have new Information on this enchantment of light spell:
> Yesterday evening a friend of mine petitioned for that spell, the
> GM Solist
> on Solusek Ro answerd the request and told him that the spell is
> IN the game
> and can be bought from a merchant.
>
> So guys get up, make a roundtrip checking all the merchants near
> to you, and
> presumably someone will come up with the location. If its new in the game,
> thats what it is likely from the information, it maybe also with
> the common
> spelldealers.
>
> We checked Neriak yesterday, but couldn't lay hand on it.
>
> Niniel,
> lvl 10 darkelf enchantress on Solusek Ro
